  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminAccountCrudController
    This class named AdminAccountCrudController is responsible for handling CRUD operations related to Admin accounts.
    AdminDashboardController
    The AdminDashboardController class manages requests related to the admin dashboard and logout functionality.
    AvailableReservationsAdminController
    This class handles requests related to available reservations for administrators.
    AvailableReservationsController
    This class handles requests related to available reservations for guests.
    CartAdminController
    This class handles requests related to the admin's cart and checkout functionality.
    CartController
    This class handles requests related to the guest's cart and checkout functionality.
    CheckedOutController
    This class handles requests related to checked-out reservations.
    CheckedOutControllerAdmin
    This class handles requests related to checked-out reservations by the admin.
    GraphicalViewController
    This class handles requests related to displaying the hotel floor plan.
    GuestAccountCrudController
    This class handles CRUD operations related to guest accounts.
    GuestDashboardController
    This class handles requests related to the guest dashboard.
    LoginController
    This class handles user authentication, login, logout, and password reset functionality.
    PaymentController
    Controller responsible for handling payment and checkout processes.
    ReservationsAdminController
    This class is responsible for managing reservations on the admin side of the hotel website.
    ReservationsGuestController
    This class is responsible for managing reservations on the guest side of the hotel website.
    RoomController
    Manages room-related operations such as adding, updating, and deleting rooms.
    SavedReservationsController
    This class is responsible for managing saved reservations.
    SignUpAdminController
    This class is responsible for managing admin sign-up.
    SignUpGuestController
    This class is responsible for managing guest sign-up.
